text: There’s a hen who can’t stop crowing
On the farm, she’s boasting, glowing
Though she lays but one egg only
All day long she keeps on going
There’s a hen who can’t stop crowing
On the farm, she’s boasting, glowing
Though she lays but one egg only
All day long she keeps on going
Cluck cluck here, Cluck cluck there
One egg bakes a cake to share
Cluck cluck here, Cluck cluck there
One egg bakes a cake to share
She’s so pleased, she calls out proudly
Flaps her wings and clucks so loudly
On the farm there’s so much shouting
She’s so noisy and so rowdy
She’s so pleased, she calls out proudly
Flaps her wings and clucks so loudly
On the farm there’s so much shouting
She’s so noisy and so rowdy
Cluck cluck here, Cluck cluck there
One egg bakes a cake to share

One egg bakes a cake to share
